### Type of Change
- [ ] 🐛 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] ✨ New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] 💥 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] 📝 Documentation update
- [ ] 🎨 Code style update (formatting, local variables)
- [ ] ♻️ Refactoring (no functional changes, no api changes)
- [ ] ⚡ Performance improvements
- [ ] 🔧 Build configuration changes
- [ ] 🧪 Test updates

## Code Quality

### Code Review Checklist
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] TypeScript types are properly defined
- [ ] Components are properly documented
- [ ] No console.log statements left in code
- [ ] Error handling is implemented
- [ ] Loading states are handled

### Accessibility Checklist
- [ ] Semantic HTML is used
- [ ] ARIA labels are provided where needed
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works properly
- [ ] Focus states are visible
- [ ] Screen reader friendly

### SEO Checklist
- [ ] Page titles are optimized
- [ ] Meta descriptions are compelling
- [ ] Headers use proper hierarchy (H1 → H2 → H3)
- [ ] Images have descriptive alt text
- [ ] Internal links use descriptive anchor text
- [ ] Structured data is implemented where applicable

## Deployment

### Pre-deployment Checklist
- [ ] All tests pass
- [ ] Build succeeds without warnings
- [ ] Environment variables updated (if needed)
- [ ] Database migrations run (if applicable)
- [ ] External service configurations updated (if needed)

### Post-deployment Verification
- [ ] Feature works correctly in production
- [ ] Analytics tracking is functional
- [ ] No new errors in error monitoring
- [ ] Performance metrics are acceptable

- [ ] HTTPS enforced where applicable
